12. What Is Included In The Standard?


Up: Contents Next: What Is Not Included In The Standard? Previous: What Platforms Are Targets For Implementation?

The standard includes:

  • Point-to-point communication,
  • Datatypes,
  • Collective operations,
  • Process groups,
  • Communication contexts,
  • Process topologies,
  • Environmental management and inquiry,
  • The Info object,
  • Process creation and management,
  • One-sided communication,
  • External interfaces,
  • Parallel file I/O,
  • Language bindings for Fortran and C,
  • Tool support.



Up: Contents Next: What Is Not Included In The Standard? Previous: What Platforms Are Targets For Implementation?
